entry.title: Everyday Essentials – 5” Sherlock Pipe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 14.99

The functionality of a flat base and straight stem together with the ultra-clean taste of a deep-bowl glass pipe, now in one sleek, minimalist design. The Everyday Essential 5” Sherlock Pipe is an affordable, high-quality piece that would be a welcome addition to any smoker’s collection. It’s made from colored borosilicate glass and comes in 5 stylish variations. Perfect for everyday use, try the Everyday Essentials 5” Sherlock Pipe today!

 

  • 5” length
  • Deep Bowl
  • Anti-Roll Flat Base
  • Left-side Carb Hole
  • Heat-resistant Glass
  • Functional Straight Stem Design
  • Available in 5 Stylish Variations

entry.title: Famous X 3” Glass Blunt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 6.99

The 3 Inch Glass Blunt by Famous X provides clean, smooth hits and a blunt-like experience, without the fuss of rolling.

  • High-quality Borosilicate Glass
  • Silicone Grommet
  • Flared Mouthpiece
  • Functional Minimalist Design
  • Compact 3” Length
  • POP Display Tray of 48 Included

The Famous X 3 Inch Glass Blunt makes the perfect companion for smokers on the go!

Not only will this awesome accessory deliver top-quality hits in a convenient, compact package, but it will also help you save! Forget about constantly buying papers and filter tips. This retractable glass pipe delivers blunt-like experience without any of the burning paper taste, so your hits are pure bud without any filler material. This attractive and well-designed glass accessory will give you the freedom to get up and go, without having to worry about rolling up one for the road.

This handy little accessory is perfect for any smoker who wants a clean, enjoyable smoke without anything getting in the way. It’s just you and your best bud with the Famous X Glass Blunt. Its quality construction makes cleaning and maintenance a breeze, and with proper care, it will last for years. Its straight, minimalist design features clear glass with the Famous Brandz signature star logo. It comes conveniently packaged in a POP display tray of 48.

entry.title: Famous Design 5” Space Hammer Hand Pipe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 12.45

Famous Brandz launched a new collection that includes five eye-catching pieces: one spoon, one taster and three hammer pipes, all equipped with a bright or modern design. All of the pipes in this dazzling collection are made from high quality, handblown borosilicate glass. They are long lasting in design and come with their own custom box.

Space has a minimalistic geometric print on a red base and is the ideal piece for a sleek, modern pipe. This basic, yet elegant 5” hammer pipe is easy to clean and maintain. It features a deep bowl and left side choke for a simple and straightforward hit.

So if you are on the lookout for a hammer pipe with a unique look to add to your glass collection, you have found your perfect match. Purchase Space and the rest of the Famous Brandz collection, right here for the best available prices

entry.title: Rainbow Swirl Spoon Pipes – 4 Inch
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Spoon Pipe
Price: 14.99

It’s no gold and all pot at the end of this rainbow! Our 4 Inch Rainbow Swirl Spoon Pipes make a perfectly colorful addition to any smoker’s collection. Hand-blown from high quality borosilicate glass, these pipes are not only heat resistant, but are durable and made to last.

The pipes feature a carb hole on the left side, glass beads for improved grip, and are available in three unique styles: Rainbow, Dark Rainbow, and Rasta Swirl.

Product dimensions: L 4” x W 2” x H 1.5”

entry.title: CHEECH & CHONG CLYDE 6 IN DOUBLE CHAMBER BUBBLER
entry.s:vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
Type: Bubbler
Price: 21.99

The bubbly smoke gets separated, cooled and filtered as its pulled through the slits in the two submerged showerhead diffusers before traveling up the slightly bent neck and out of the bulbous mouthpiece. This process looks great to watch and results in a smoother more enjoyable hit that’s full of flavor and less harsh on the throat and lungs. We recommend placing a metal screen in the herb bowl to prevent unwanted crumbs and ash from traveling into the water.

Specifications

Brand Cheech & Chong
Color clear with black accents
Height 16 cm / 6.3 inches
Percolator Type Showerhead Perc

 

The bubbler measures 16 cm / 6.3 inches in height and both chambers have thick bases for extra stability. The chambers are decorated with a black Cheech & Chong's decal and both of the showerhead diffusers are constructed from beautiful black glass.

The Cheech & Chong’s Clyde dry herb bubbler will look great in any glass collection and comes packed in a themed box.
entry.s:tag: Vendor_Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

entry.title: Puff Puff Pass Strain Pineapple Express Sherlock Pipe Green 4 in.
entry.summary:
Vendor: PUFF PUFF PASS
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 8.90

Puff, Puff, Pass has come out with the perfect way to show love to your favorite strains. By putting them on their new collection of pipes and grinders! These awesome pieces come in a multitude of colors and are emblazoned with their signature strain. Collect your favorite, or all of them.

You’ll be right at “ho(l)me(s)” with this awesome Sherlock strain pipe. Sitting 4”/10.16cm in length, it’s small enough to take on the go, but ideal for puff, puff, passing around at home. This pipe is made with thick, handblown borosilicate glass which makes cleaning it incredibly easy. The deep bowl is equipped with a built-in screen. No longer dig through your ashtray for yours, this one stays in place. It also helps keep the interior of the pipe cleaner. The mouthpiece even has an ash catcher, so if something does escape from the bowl it won’t end up in your mouth. The choke is on the left-side of the bowl and helps regulate the air flow while smoking, making your draw smoother.

Pineapple Express is a green pipe with a yellow pineapple attached to a light leaf on the end. It fills you with productive and creative energy.

entry.title: Jay and Bob Glass Blunt 30 Piece Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jay and Silent Bob
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 130.00

A refillable and reusable joint? Snooch to the Nooch! Jay & Silent Bob bring you glass blunts for your smoking pleasure. These glass pipes allow you to pack a little or a lot into the end and smoke until your hearts content. Want to take a break mid-way through? No worries. Push the mouthpiece forward and release the burning ash, then simply light it again when you’re ready. This is the perfect accessory for people who can’t roll, people who hate wasting paper or just want to do their part to save the environment. Littered in awesome fan-inspired designs from Kevin Smith’s View Askewniverse, burn a blunt with all your favorite cinematic stoners like Jay, Silent Bob, Buddy Christ and the doobage duo themselves Bluntman and Chronic! Collect all 10. Each glass blunt is 3/7.62cm” in length and comes in a dope display-worthy POP tray of 30.

B5133 - Costume
Get ready for action with Bluntman & Chronic.
B5135 - Yeah
Ready to Smoke? Yeah!
B5137 - Weed
Surround yourself with psychedelic plants
B5139 - Plan
Don’t think too hard
B5141 - Wow
Always excited and ready to wow
B5143 - Buddy Christ
Your favorite friend
B5145 - Illusion
Super trippy
B5147 - Hit It
Feeling the effects
B5149 - Smoke
On the run from a cloud of fun
B5151 - JSB
Best friends getting ready to bun

entry.title: San Rafael-Hammer Pipe-Blue-5.4in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 14.99

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

Sick of spoon pipes? Grab a hammer! The fun shape and large bowl on this piece make smoking sessions a dream. The left side choke helps regulate air flow and provides the perfect hit. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass and sitting 5”/12.7cm in length this pipe provides cool, clean draws. 

Adorned with a classic San Rafael image on the front, the minimalistic logo doesn’t take away from the stunning style of this pipe. The unique blue fumed coloring makes it worthy of any connoisseurs collection.

One of the biggest names in Cannabis is here to bring you the best in smoking accessories. From hand pipes to water pipes and a plethora of papers, you can’t go wrong with this well thought out collection. Simple in design, but functional in nature grab these awesome Aurora pieces.

Sick of spoon pipes? Grab a hammer! The fun shape and large bowl on this piece make smoking sessions a dream. The left side choke helps regulate air flow and provides the perfect hit. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass and sitting 4” in length this pipe provides cool, clean draws.

Adorned with a classic Aurora image on the stem, the minimalistic logo doesn’t take away from the stunning style of this pipe. The unique fumed coloring makes it worthy of any connoisseurs collection.

entry.title: Hornets Nest Glass Pipe
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 33.75

Beautiful and delicate, this hornets nest pipe is a connoisseur collector's dream. This stunning pipe is made from handblown, borosilicate glass. Using a honeycomb design on multiple parts of the pipe as well as a number of other glassblowing techniques makes this elegant pipe unique. The colours and shapes swirl and twirl to create an eye catching visual effect. This pipe features a deep bowl, which allows you to pack a little or a lot inside. It also has a left side choke, this helps to regulate air flow and make your hit smoother. Don't shake the hornets nest, just delight in the wonder of this intricate glass pipe.

entry.title: Thick Design Metal Pipe (Assorted)
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 1.90

Tired of breaking your glass pipes? Get something sturdier, like metal! This thick pipe can be dropped and bumped all while staying perfectly intact. It’s easy to clean by using 99% alcohol and is perfectly portable.

entry.title: Rock Legends Jimi USA Spoon Pipe White 4 in.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rock Legends
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 9.99

After receiving his first guitar at 15, he taught himself to play by watching and learning from experienced entertainers. He was fired from his first gig for showing off, but later became one of the most influential guitarists and celebrated musicians in history. He headlined massive music festivals like Woodstock and Isle of Wright. In 1970 he tragically succumbed to the infamous 27 Club. Leaving behind an eternal legacy and securing his place as a rock legend.

The USA hand pipe is made from thick, handblown borosilicate glass. Only 4”/10.16cm in length it fits perfectly in your hand and is great to take on the go. USA features a deep bowl that is able to hold a large amount of herb. It is recommended to use a glass or metal screen to prevent debris from falling through the hole. This pipe is equipped with a choke on the left side of the bowl. A choke helps regulate air flow and makes your hit smoother. The base of the pipe is flat, this makes it easier to put down and comes in handy while cleaning. Easily clean it using 99% alcohol or a quality bong cleaner.

USA is a white spoon pipe that’s emblazoned with the classic black Famous Brandz star on the mouthpiece. It is also embellished with an iconic image of the rock legend in front of the American flag on the front of the bowl.

entry.title: Rock Legends Jimi USA Sherlock Pipe Blue 6 in.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rock Legends
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 17.99

 After receiving his first guitar at 15, he taught himself to play by watching and learning from experienced entertainers. He was fired from his first gig for showing off, but later became one of the most influential guitarists and celebrated musicians in history. He headlined massive music festivals like Woodstock and Isle of Wright. In 1970 he tragically succumbed to the infamous 27 Club. Leaving behind an eternal legacy and securing his place as a rock legend.

The USA hammer-style sherlock hand pipe is made from thick, handblown borosilicate glass. Measuring 6” /15.24cm  in length, this pipe is perfect for sizable sessions at home. USA features a massive bowl that fits a substantial amount of herb. It features a built-in screen in the bowl helps prevent ash and debris from falling through the hole while smoking. It has a large choke on the left hand side, which helps regulate air flow and makes your hit smoother. The classic pipe mouthpiece provides an enjoyable draw and is ergonomic to smoke from. Clean this legendary piece with 99% alcohol or a quality bong cleaner.

USA is a blue hammer style sherlock pipe and has a white Famous Brandz star on the stem. It is also embellished with an image of the rock legend playing his iconic guitar in front of a big ol’ American flag.
